dcterms:description: A dataset generated by the authors containing 10,122 pouring sequences, each 15 seconds long, for a total of 2,531 minutes of video or over 4.5 million labeled images, used for training and testing deep learning models for liquid detection and tracking.
dcterms:title: Pouring Dataset

dcterms:creator: Blender Online Community
dcterms:description: A 3D modeling and rendering package used for generating realistic liquid simulations and rendering images for the dataset.
dcterms:title: Blender

dcterms:creator: C. Körner
T. Pohl
U. Rüde
N. Thürey
T. Zeiser
dcterms:description: A library for liquid simulation based on the lattice-Boltzmann method, used for efficient and physically accurate liquid simulations in the dataset.
dcterms:title: El’Beem
